column4: Quequeg: hi i got a weird problem... my DEL key stopped doing anything.  It shows in xev okay, other kbds make no diff, but X does not seem to respond to it (X.Org).  any ideas?
not particularly -- why single me out?  ;)
Oh, sorry.  I typed Q - Colon to mean question.  X-Chat musta did a username lookup / substitution.  :-D
